Clear and easy to read subs.

Accurate translation plus cultural notes as well as informing viewers tennis terminology and rules. The verbal tics, nicknames and other idiosyncrasies of the characters were also cleverly brought to the viewers attention.

Frequent translator notes for words that can be easily translated into English ("Keikaku means plan" TL notes). In addition, there are occasional grammatical mistakes. However their greatest crime is the over liberalization of the script.
